title: Bug 2345[Editor Mgmt] Open with a different type of editor has no effect if file already open (1GEWMSQ)
description: Bug 2345[Editor Mgmt] Open with a different type of editor has no effect if file already open (1GEWMSQ)
OB:
When following the steps in: 1GEWMOZ:
1. Open a new basic project.
2. Create a new file named test.xml.
3. By default, the scripted resource editor example is used to open the XML files.
4. Select test.xml in the Navigator.
5. Choose 'Open With...' and select 'Default Text Editor'.

Observed Behavior:
Nothing happens and the scripted resource editor example remains active, ignoring the XML file content.

Searching for an existing open file should also consider the editor types.

Expected Behavior:
Instead of reactivating the scripted resource editor example, a new editor should be opened for the file because the editor type is different.

NOTES:
